extDescription.message: G Drive helps you save files to Google Drive and returns a list of URLs so you can easily share them on Backlog as previews.

sidepanelPageFolderInfo.message: Files will be saved in the "" folder on your Google Drive. Change folder

sidepanelPageDropZone.message: Drag & Drop or click here to choose files

sidepanelPageConnectGoogleDrive.message: Connect your Google Drive account to continue

sidepanelPageWarningMessage.message: The extension's use and transfer of information received from Google APIs to any other app will adhere to Google API Services User Data Policy, including the Limited Use requirements

sidepanelPageAccessMessage.message: Enjoy quick access to your Google Drive files
